00076 void macInit(u8 Channel)
00077 {
00078     macConfig.panId = BROADCASTPANID;
00079     macConfig.shortAddress = BROADCASTADDR;
00080     macConfig.associated = false;
00081 
00082     macConfig.parentShortAddress = BROADCASTADDR;
00083     macConfig.lastRoute = BROADCASTADDR;
00084     macConfig.hopsToCoord = 0;
00085     macConfig.busy = 0;
00086     macConfig.sleeping = 1; // Assume sleeping state initially
00087 
00088     // Init radio
00089     radioInit(SERIAL ? true : false);
00090 
00091     // Set the channel
00092     macConfig.currentChannel = Channel;
00093     if (Channel != 0xff)
00094         radioSetOperatingChannel(Channel);
00095 
00096     radioUseAutoTxCrc(true);
00097     radioSetTrxState(TRX_OFF);
00098 
00099     // Set RF212 to 250KB mode.
00100     radioSetup900();
00101 
00102     // Set ack times shorter
00103     hal_subregister_write(SR_AACK_ACK_TIME, 1);
00104 
00105     radioSetTrxState(RX_AACK_ON);
00106 
00107     // Setup the address of this device by reading a stored address from eeprom.
00108     halGetMacAddr((u8*)&macConfig.longAddr);
00109 
00110     // Set up radio's coordinator flag
00111     radioSetDeviceRole(NODETYPE == COORD);
00112 
00113     // Setup radio's short addess
00114     radioSetShortAddress(BROADCASTADDR);
00115 
00116     // Setup radio's PANID
00117     radioSetPanId(BROADCASTPANID);
00118 
00119     // Set up the radio for auto mode operation.
00120     hal_subregister_write( SR_MAX_FRAME_RETRIES, 2 );
00121 
00122     // Load the long address into the radio. Needed for auto modes.
00123     radioSetExtendedAddress((uint8_t *)&macConfig.longAddr);
00124 
00125     // Initialize the array of nodes (coordinator only)
00126     macInitNodes();
00127 }
00128 
00135 void macSetOperatingChannel(u8 channel)
00136 {
00137     // Set the channel
00138     macConfig.currentChannel = channel;
00139     radioSetOperatingChannel(channel);
00140 }
